tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE telecardiology_billing (
    patient_id INT,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    billing_code INT,
    insurance_provider VARCHAR(50),
    claim_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE telecardiology_services (
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    service_type VARCHAR(50),
    service_date DATE,
    service_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
    claim_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    insurance_company VARCHAR(100),
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    claim_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE TelecardiologyAppointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    doctor_id INT,
    appointment_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE telecardiology_appointment (
  appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  doctor_id UUID,
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
  duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE telecardiology_claims (
  claim_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  appointment_id UUID,
  service_id UUID,
  claim_date TIMESTAMP,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE billing (
  billing_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INTEGER,
  amount DECIMAL,
  insurance_company VARCHAR,
  billing_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE insurance (
  insurance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INTEGER,
  insurance_company VARCHAR,
  policy_number VARCHAR,
  policy_holder_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE telecardiology_services (
  service_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INTEGER,
  service_type VARCHAR,
  service_date DATE,
  service_cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE financial_operations (
  operation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  operation_type VARCHAR,
  operation_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE claims_processing (
  claim_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INTEGER,
  claim_status VARCHAR,
  submitted_date DATE,
  processing_date DATE
)
